<Heading
  as={"h1"}

>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/webhooks/endpoints"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Creates a new webhook endpoint for receiving event notifications

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","required":["url","events"],"properties":{"url":{"type":"string","format":"uri","description":"URL to send webhook events to"},"events":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"string","enum":["payment.created","payment.succeeded","payment.failed","payment.cancelled","checkout.session.completed","checkout.session.expired","refund.created","refund.succeeded","refund.failed"]},"minItems":1,"description":"Events to subscribe to"},"description":{"type":"string","description":"Description of the webhook endpoint"}},"title":"CreateWebhookEndpointRequest"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Webhook endpoint created successfully","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"id":{"type":"string","description":"Unique identifier","example":"we_1abc2def3ghi"},"object":{"type":"string","enum":["webhook_endpoint"]},"url":{"type":"string","format":"uri"},"events":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"string"}},"secret":{"type":"string","description":"Secret for verifying webhook signatures","example":"whsec_xyz123abc456"},"status":{"type":"string","enum":["enabled","disabled"]},"created":{"type":"integer","description":"Unix timestamp of creation"}},"title":"WebhookEndpoint"}}}},"400":{"description":"Bad request","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"error":{"type":"object","properties":{"type":{"type":"string","enum":["api_error","authentication_error","invalid_request","rate_limit_error","validation_error"]},"message":{"type":"string","description":"Human-readable error message"},"code":{"type":"string","description":"Machine-readable error code"}}}},"title":"Error"}}}},"401":{"description":"Authentication failed","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"error":{"type":"object","properties":{"type":{"type":"string","enum":["api_error","authentication_error","invalid_request","rate_limit_error","validation_error"]},"message":{"type":"string","description":"Human-readable error message"},"code":{"type":"string","description":"Machine-readable error code"}}}},"title":"Error"}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
